conclusion: Objects A and B are in the air.
Objects C, D, E, and F are already on the table.
As objects A and B move downward due to gravity, they come into contact with objects C, D, E, and F.
The impact causes the cloths (the gray and brown sheets) to wrinkle or fold.
The cloths have visible wrinkles and folds.
The cloths on the table wrinkle and fold due to the gravitational force when objects A and B come into contact with objects C, D, E, and F.
